word:
Angels of heaven are taking note of all our works and watching to see how they can minister to our needs. With intensity of spirit, all heaven stands ready to lend aid to us in our divine progress. Shall we improve our present opportunities and receive the impress of the divine image?--Ms. 127, 1907, pp. 6-7. ("The Work in Southern California," Nov. 3, 1907.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. October 27, 1982
